name: (EXP) Nitroglycerine (Nitro)
content:
One of the oldest explosives, nitro is no longer actively used due to its instability.

Nitroglycerine will always detonate if caught in the blast radius of another explosive, if dropped from a height of more than 5 feet, or if ignited.
